name: TWReverseAuth
summary: I don't recomend using TWReverseAuth, please use 'pod SHOmniAuthTwitter' instead.
description:
I don't recomend using TWReverseAuth, please use 'pod SHOmniAuthTwitter' instead.
  More information at https://github.com/SHOmniAuth/SHOmniAuthTwitter
  Get in touch if you need some help.
